cms.tag: David Pollak presents the Lift Basics online course on Jan 4th, 2011 at 9am PST

div.p: David Pollak is the founder and BDFL of the Lift Framework open source project.

Join David for a 4 hour introductory session to Lift. David will cover:
Lift's View First and Design Friendly templates to mock up the UI of your application
Associate the UI with application behavior via Lift's snippets
Explore Lift's Ajax and Comet features by adding interactive features to your app
Expose your app data via JSON using Lift's REST helpers
The class is open for up to 12 participants.
The price is $99 per participant. You can pay via PayPal or company check.
All participants must have Java 6 installed on their machine.
Please join David for 4 hours of fun, learning and exploration.

Please register for Lift Basics on Tuesday, January 4, 2011 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM PST at:
